Equipment Actions.Action 1: Fist, Melee Weapon Attack, Range: 5ft, Average Damage: 5 Bludgeoning plus 5 Poison

Other Actions.Action 1: Pacifying Spores, The Myconid ejects spores at a creature that can stun them
Other Actions.Action 2: Rapport Spores, The Myconid expels spores around it.  Infected creatures can speak telepathically with each other

Abilities.Ability 1: Distress Spore, The Myconid shares its pain with all other nearby Myconids
Abilities.Ability 2: Sun Sickness, The Myconid has disadvantage on ability checks, attack rolls and saving throws while in sunlight.  It will die after spending an hour or more in direct sunlight
